game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.description: Embark on an adventure to find the lost treasure hidden deep in the jungle.

task.description: Search for the hidden cave to acquire the ancient map leading to the treasure.

task.objective: Defeat the giant snake guarding the entrance to the cave
task.description: The ancient map leads to the treasure, but it is guarded by a fierce giant snake. You must defeat it to enter the hidden cave.
